where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}

mapper.select:
SELECT
,
FROM tb_culpro_chinese_medicine order by itemUpdateAt desc

select
,
from tb_culpro_chinese_medicine WHERE CHINESE_MEDICINE_NAME LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR CHINESE_MEDICINE_TYPE LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR CHINESE_MEDICINE_TITLE LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR MAIN_VISIT LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR DEPT_CODE IN (select itemCode from tb_culpro_specialty WHERE SPECIALTY_NAME LIKE "%"#{value}"%") OR HOSP_CODE IN (select itemCode from tb_culpro_hosp WHERE HOSPITAL_NAME LIKE "%"#{value}"%") order by itemUpdateAt desc

select
,
from tb_culpro_chinese_medicine order by itemUpdateAt desc LIMIT 5

select
,
from tb_culpro_chinese_medicine WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{specialtyCode} order by itemUpdateAt desc

select
,
from tb_culpro_chinese_medicine WHERE CHINESE_MEDICINE_STATUS = #{status} order by itemUpdateAt desc
